headline: Omnicom and Interpublic Announce Extension of Exchange Offers
summary: Omnicom Group Inc. ("Omnicom") (NYSE: OMC) and The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. ("IPG") (NYSE: IPG) today announced that Omnicom has extended the expiration date of its previously announced (A) offers to exchange (each an "Exchange Offer" and, collectively the "Exchange Offers") any and all outstanding 4.650% Notes due 2028 (the "Existing IPG 2028 Notes"), 4.750% Notes due 2030 (the "Existing IPG 2030 Notes"), 2.400% Notes due 2031 (the "Existing IPG 2031 Notes"), 5.375% Notes due 2033 (
